description.raw:
Redo of pull request #630, fix for #775. Several header files (Common.hh, Gui.hh, Physics.hh, Rendering.hh, Sensors.hh, and Transport.hh) conflict with auto-generated headers (common.hh, gui.hh, physics.hh, rendering.hh, sensors.hh, and transport.hh) on case-insensitive filesystems. This pull request renames one set (ie. Common.hh to CommonIface.hh) and auto-generates a header that gives a deprecated warning if a case-sensitive filesystem is detected.

The meat of the changes are in the top 2 files (CmakeLists.txt and cmake/GazeboUtils.cmake) and the last file (tools/issue_775_generator.bash).

I've targeted to 1.9 so we can get 1.9 building on osx.

title.raw: Fix for #775, deprecate headers that require case-sensitive filesystem
